sentences.en: A bosom friend afar brings a distant land near.
sentences.cn: 海内存知己,天涯若比邻.

sentences.en: A dark jealousy stirred in his bosom.
sentences.cn: 他内心生出一阵恶毒的嫉妒.

sentences.en: Drury harboured bitterness in his bosom.
He spent his weekend in the bosom of his family.
sentences.cn: 他在家庭团聚中度他的周末.

sentences.en: Joan was delighted to welcome her boyfriend into the bosom of her large, close-knit family.
sentences.cn: 琼十分高兴地欢迎她的男朋友加入她亲密无间的大家庭。

sentences.en: Sakota was her cousin and bosom pal.
sentences.cn: 沙科塔是她的表妹和亲密伙伴。

sentences.en: She clasped her child to her bosom.
sentences.cn: 她把孩子紧紧揽在怀里.

sentences.en: She clutched the child to her bosom.
She cradled the child to her bosom.
She drew a little book from her bosom.
sentences.cn: 她从怀里取出一本小册子.

sentences.en: She feels an ache in her bosom.
She felt an ache in her bosom.
She lay on the bed, her eyes closed and her bosom palpitating.
sentences.cn: 她躺在床上，闭着眼，胸部起伏不定。

sentences.en: She pressed him to her bosom.
sentences.cn: 她紧紧地把他抱在胸前。

sentences.en: The dress exaggerates her wasp waist and enlarges her bosom.
sentences.cn: 那件连衣裙凸显了她的蜂腰，也让她的胸部看起来更丰满。

sentences.en: We, at least, have taken her to our bosom.
sentences.cn: 至少我们对她是关爱有加的。

words.tran_cn: 胸；胸怀；中间；胸襟；内心；乳房；内部

trans.tran_en: A bosom buddy is a friend who you know very well and like very much

trans.tran_cn: 胸部，乳房，衣服的胸襟，家庭般的温暖，胸怀
trans.tran_en: the front part of a woman’s chest
